abstract: Pia Sundhage, former coach of United States women's soccer team, has returned to her home country of Sweden, where she is preparing women's national team for World Cup; does not like to stay in one place and is already considering career moves in 2016.
lead_paragraph: Sundhage, who led the United States to two Olympic titles and will face her former team in the Women’s World Cup on Friday, was born in Sweden, but she has always been a wanderer.

headline.main: Pia Sundhage of Sweden Is a Coach at Home on the Move
headline.print_headline: A Coach Who Is Most at Home on the Move

snippet: Sundhage, who led the United States to two Olympic titles and will face her former team in the Women’s World Cup on Friday, was born in Sweden, but she has always been a wanderer.
